title: Frostblades
text: The Frostblades (not to be confused with the [[Paqaa Mountains]] in [[Sarlona]]) are a [[Seren]] tribe that was founded by a principled [[white dragon]]. While they ruthlessly defend the land from outsiders, they also seek to preserve weaker tribes from the depredations of more violent clans such as the [[Bringers of Fire]]. Frostblade dragonspeakers know the secret of [[alchemist's frost]] and sometimes use this as a weapon in battle.
